title: Ron Batty
text: Ronald Robson Batty (born 5 October 1925 in <a href="Lanchester%2C%20County%20Durham">Lanchester, County Durham</a> - died 1971) was an English <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29%23Full-back">full-back</a>. He began his career with non-league Stanley United before signing for <a href="Newcastle%20United">Newcastle United</a> during the <a href="Second%20World%20War">Second World War</a>. He appeared for the club in 161 league games, scoring one goal. He left the club in 1958 to move to <a href="Gateshead%20A.F.C.">Gateshead</a> where he added a further 40 league appearances before retiring. He played at left back in the FA Cup winning Newcastle United team of 1955
